show.title: Leid Stories

header.title: Had Enough of Their Mind Games? Fight Back! Free Your Mind!

title: Had Enough of Their Mind Games? Fight Back! Free Your Mind!
content:
Yet another week that the propaganda machine was in overdrive, trying to invade your mind. <!--more--> Yet another week that you gave it no victory.
Share your thoughts—and defensive tactics—with likeminded Leid Stories listeners on “Free Your Mind Friday,” the best open forum on the planet.
Give us your take on this week’s major news stories and events, or introduce ideas worthy of further discussion and debate.
Your call.
888-874-4888.
